subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Coaches and Managers
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Portland fired General Manager Kevin Pritchard but he was asked to direct the Trail Blazers’ selections in the N.B.A. draft before departing.
snippet: Portland fired General Manager Kevin Pritchard but he was asked to direct the Trail Blazers’ selections in the N.B.A. draft before departing.
